Sentencas: The glass ceramics composite sealants are among few materials suitable for the solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) due to their high operating temperatures (600 degrees C-850 degrees C).
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The glass ceramics chemically bond to both the metallic interconnector and the ceramic electrolyte and provide a gas tight connection.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A careful and several stages manufacturing procedure is required to obtain a gas tight sealing.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, effects of binder burnout process on the sealing performance are investigated employing commercially available glass ceramic powders.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The glass ceramic laminates are produced by mixing glass ceramic powders with the organic binders and employing a tape casting method.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The laminates are sandwiched between the metallic interconnectors of an SOFC cell.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The burnout and subsequent sealing quality are analyzed by measuring leakage rate and final macrostructure of sealing region.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effects of heating rate, dead weight load, solid loading, carrier gas and their flow rates are investigated.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that sealing quality is affected from all investigated parameters.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: While a slower heating rate is required for a better burnout, the mass flow rate of sweep gas must be adequate for removal of the burned gas.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The leakage rate is reduced to 0.1 ml min(-1) with 2 degrees C min(-1) + 1 degrees C min(-1) heating rate, 86.25% solid loading, 200 N dead weight load and 500 ml min(-1) sweep gas flow rate.
Titulo: Effect of binder burnout on the sealing performance of glass ceramics for solid oxide fuel cells
